subtitle: Fold a classic paper boat using simple steps

materials.paper: One rectangular sheet of paper (A4 works well)

steps.1: Place the paper vertically and fold it in half.
steps.2: Fold the top corners inward to form a triangle.
steps.3: Fold the bottom flaps upward on both sides.
steps.4: Open the triangle and flatten it into a square.
steps.5: Fold the bottom corners upward again.
steps.6: Open and pull the sides apart to form the boat.

tips.1: Use slightly thick paper for better stability.
tips.2: Make sharp creases for a clean boat shape.
tips.3: Decorate the boat after folding for fun designs.
